def insertion_sort(arr):
    o = len(arr)
    while o > 0:
        z = i
        while z < len(arr) and arr[z - 1] > arr[z]:
            temp = arr[z]
            arr[z] = arr[z - 1]
            arr[z - 1] = temp
            z += 1
        o -= 1
    return arr
